channel.title: R.I.P Eddie Murphy
channel.description:
Actually I wanted to see if people would read this or just post lol.
But really R.I.P Whitney Houston Very good singer.

item.title: R.I.P Eddie Murphy
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:49, topic:432833”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=535541.msg3918210#msg3918210 date=1329428676]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=535541.msg3917944#msg3917944 date=1329404967]

You make jokes on a dead person’s thread!? You sir, are low! >: (

thousands of people die in pointless wars but nobody gives a fuck, when a celebrity dies every is like Q_Q WHYYY???

thats why i hate people, have a nice day lol

Don’t worry, i hate people too. You too!
[/quote]I thought we were so happy together!
[/quote]I thought you weren’t human…

Imagine the children… ewwwewewewewewewewewewew[/quote]
You assume we’d have them? That is low…

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P Eddie Murphy
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:39, topic:432833”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=535541.msg3916407#msg3916407 date=1329248714]
For those who don’t know who she was, she was an extremely talented singer and her song cover in body guard, i will always love you made her as famous as she was.
[/quote]

You left out the part where she became a crackhead and couldn’t sing anymore.[/quote]
Oh, i thought i should be nice but if you want me to be disrespectful. She couldn’t sing high notes after coming back from her drug and alcohol problems and ended up having to sing softly instead of with spirit, she honestly sucked so hard when she did so.

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P Eddie Murphy
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:35, topic:432833”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=535541.msg3915761#msg3915761 date=1329167342]

You make jokes on a dead person’s thread!? You sir, are low! >: (

thousands of people die in pointless wars but nobody gives a fuck, when a celebrity dies every is like Q_Q WHYYY???

thats why i hate people, have a nice day lol

Don’t worry, i hate people too. You too!

woah i almost gave a fuck, you’re getting mad because i make a lame joke that doesn’t even include whitney houston while so many people die daily who never have a chance to get rich and famous and nobody even remembers them, to be honest i stopped caring, everyone dies and the best thing to do is not give a fuck
[/quote]
Dude calm down, i wasn’t getting mad nor being serious. I get extremely mad when famous people die and everyone keeps going on about them, it’s annoying that they’re only noticed BECAUSE they’re famous. There are many people in the world who’ve doe more good then famous people and when they die it goes unnoticed, unless you know someone actually died in a very tragic accident and even then it is only on for 1 night. That is just how this society works i suppose, pathetic, i know.[/quote]

i never got mad, i was simply stating what was on my mind plus i tought you were being serious but its a good thing you’re not, have a nice day

Read full topic

There are many people in the world who’ve doe more good then famous people and when they die it goes unnoticed, unless you know someone actually died in a very tragic accident and even then it is only on for 1 night. item.title: R.I.P Eddie Murphy
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

‘It’s not right, but it’s okay’ …sings Whitney Houston’s coroner as he slowly unbuckles his belt.

Whitney Houston died just hours after being asked to be a judge on the next season of X-Factor. Personally I think she made the right decision.

If she wasn’t before, Whitney Houston is definitely 100% soul now.

A full day of Whitney Houston on MTV. I don’t know who is in hell, me or her.

Such a shame. I was even having a wank over Whitney when I found out she was dead. It made me cry and I never got to come. Thank fuck. The last thing I need is my DNA at yet another crime scene.

Read full topic
